name: Dinah's Stuffed Mushrooms
author: DEBNJAMES
summary: Delicious mushroom caps filled with a clam stuffing! Very easy, and even better than the stuffed mushrooms from that famous Italian restaurant chain.... Garnish with lemon wedges when serving.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish
Arrange mushroom caps hollow side up in the baking dish
In a medium bowl, mix together minced clams, garlic, Parmesan cheese, onion, bread crumbs, green bell pepper, parsley, Italian-style seasoning and black pepper
Slowly stir in approximately 1/2 the butter, enough to make the mixture slightly moist
Generously fill the mushroom caps with the clam mixture
Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until lightly browned
